hint.en: This Trigger will be called when someone interacts with the doorlock. Either with the Keypad, RFID or Manual.
hint.nl: Deze Trigger wordt aangeroepen zodra iemand interactie heeft met het slot. Dit kan gebeuren d.m.v. gebruik van Keypad, RFID of Manual.

instruction.en:
Install the module and ensure that the inside and outside units are connected. Activate pairing mode by removing and reinserting the batteries into the lock. The module will automatically enter pairing mode for approximately four minutes, indicated by flashing LED indicators.

If this doesn't work, try resetting the module by holding down the reset button until the orange LED indicator starts blinking rapidly (after about 15 seconds). Release the button immediately.

hint.en: Automatically lock after a little while when the lock has been unlocked.
hint.nl: Na een bepaalde tijd het slot vergrendelen zodra het slot is ontgrendeld.
